title: Power on the farm
brief_description: A comprehensive survey of the advantages which electrical power supply offers to those living in rural areas. On poultry farms, dairy farms, and small mixed farms, electricity can prove an excellent time and labour saver, both for the farmer and his wife.
description: A comprehensive survey of the advantages which electrical power supply offers to those living in rural areas. On poultry farms, dairy farms, and small mixed farms, electricity can prove an excellent time and labour saver, both for the farmer and his wife.
